title: Having the Hard Conversations
itunes:summary:
When a hard conversation is needed, it's critical to show your spouse a lot of grace. Greg, Erin and John talk about ways they've learned to make the tough conversations productive, and will provide some helpful guidelines you can apply in your marriage. Featuring Dr. David Clarke.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY
